features.title: Margin Platform Foundation
features.description: Built a complete LLM cost tracking system to solve the margin visibility problem for AI SaaS companies. Tracks token usage across OpenAI, Anthropic, and OpenRouter (400+ models). Provides real-time cost attribution per customer.

features.title: QuoteKit Payment Systems
features.description: Extracted and refactored billing infrastructure from production systems, handling complex edge cases like proration, upgrades/downgrades, trial conversions, and coupon stacking. Built a 720-line edge case coordinator.

features.title: Results That Matter
features.description: These are not theoretical solutions. Ai.Rio's failed payment recovery improved recovery rates from 47.6% to 65-70%. The cost tracking solved actual margin problems for production AI SaaS companies.
